Onion plants are a Farming crop grown at level 5 Farming. Onions are grown by planting 3 onion seeds in an allotment patch with a seed dibber. Once planted, the nearby farmer may be paid to watch over the allotment. Payment is 1 sack of potatoes and optionally may be noted to save you space.

Planting the onion seeds gives 9.5 farming experience. If the farmer does not watch the allotment, then disease in the allotment may be removed using Plant cure, or using the Cure plant spell in the Lunar spellbook with level 66 Magic and completion of Lunar Diplomacy (albeit more expensive, this can save inventory space when doing farm runs). However, if left alone, the diseased allotment will die.

Each onion, when picked, gives 10.5 farming experience. Once all onions have been picked, the allotment will be clear for new crops.

Farming info[edit | edit source]

'''Onion plants''' are a [[Farming]] crop grown at level 5 Farming. Onions are grown by planting 3 [[onion seed]]s in an [[allotment patch]] with a [[seed dibber]]. Once planted, the nearby farmer may be paid to watch over the allotment. Payment is 1 [[sack of potatoes]] and optionally may be noted to save you space.

Planting the onion seeds gives 9.5 farming experience. If the farmer does not watch the allotment, then disease in the allotment may be removed using [[Plant cure]], or using the [[Cure plant]] spell in the [[Lunar]] spellbook with level 66 Magic and completion of [[Lunar Diplomacy]] (albeit more expensive, this can save inventory space when doing farm runs). However, if left alone, the diseased allotment will die.

Each onion, when picked, gives 10.5 farming experience. Once all onions have been picked, the allotment will be clear for new crops.
